item.title: Shophandler [PI]

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

int TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); int canBuy = 0; int totalAmount = 0;

Have no idea about the first integer, all I can tell is that the value is being truncated.
canBuy I would only assume is for how many items you can buy.
And totalAmount is the totalAmount for an item I would guess.

Just a few assumptions, as I really have no idea.
